name: B.E.E.
description:
in B.E.E. you play as the Belligerent Entity Exterminator, taking down the rulers of the galaxy. Do you have what it takes to fight the greatest ships in the known cosmos?

Game made with Godot and Aseprite. 

This game is a spiritual successor to A.N.T. made by Tribow. If you like this game check out A.N.T.
